5100.name: The City Entrance
5100.description:
This is the entrance to a small underground city. A great adamantite
gate lies open to the west allowing entrance into the city. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

west.description: A huge gate opens to the west allowing entrance into the city.

up.description: A passageway opens up into a fairly large cave above.

5101.name: A City Street
5101.description:
You walk along a highly ornate street going north-south. A large gate
lies to the east while a building lies to the west. The air is still and
musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to A City Street

east.description: A passage leads to The City Entrance

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to The Slave Chamber

5102.name: A City Street
5102.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going north and west. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty. The air is
stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

north.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5103.name: A City Street
5103.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. A large
house stands to the south. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows
gather in the corners.

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

south.description: A passage leads to The 3rd House

west.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5104.name: The 3rd House
5104.description:
The area opens inside the 3rd house of the city; it is fairly well
decorated by drow standards having a few statues, murals and such. A
door leads to the south. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to A City Street

south.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

5105.name: The Throne Room
5105.description:
The throne room of the 3rd house is about as decorated as the inner
courtyard except with a blood covered altar in the center of the room.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The 3rd House

5106.name: A City Street
5106.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north
is a large building. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The
air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Warriors' Academy

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5107.name: A City Street
5107.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north and east. To
the south is an extremely large house. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A passage leads to The Main Gate

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

south.description: A passage leads to The 2nd House

5108.name: The 2nd House
5108.description:
The area opens inside the 2nd house of the city. The room is highly
decorated with statues of spiders and murals everywhere. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

5109.name: The Throne Room
5109.description:
The throne room of the 2nd house is just a little more decorative than
the inner courtyard having an altar in the center of the room. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to The 2nd House

5110.name: The Main Gate
5110.description:
This is the entrance to the 1st house of the city. A large gate, almost
as big and elegant as the one at the entrance to the city, stands here.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and
musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A City Street

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A large gate lies to the west.

5111.name: The 1st House
5111.description:
The area opens in the inner courtyard of the 1st and largest house in
the city. The room is extremely large and decorative. Mural and
paintings hang on the walls depicting some battles and a spider queen.
The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: A passage leads to The Main Gate

west.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

5112.name: The Throne Room
5112.description:
The throne room of the 1st house is in one word...awesome. It is so
horrifying it is almost beautiful. The air is still and musty. Shadows
gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to The Main Chamber

east.description: A passage leads to The 1st House

5113.name: The Main Chamber
5113.description:
This is the council chamber for the Matron Mother herself. A huge table
and chairs surrounding it sits in the center of the room. The air is
still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

south.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

5114.name: A City Street
5114.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading north-south and east.
The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

north.description: A passage leads to A City Street

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

south.description: A passage leads to The Main Gate

5115.name: A City Street
5115.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading south. A building is
to the west. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch.

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to The Clerics' Academy

5116.name: The Clerics' Academy
5116.description:
This is the most lavish of the academies being that it is for the
clerics. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.
The air is stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners,
undisturbed.

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5117.name: A City Street
5117.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going east-west. To the north
is a giant temple. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: The entrance to the temple of Lloth is blocked by large ornamental gates.

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5118.name: The Warriors' Academy
5118.description:
The Warriors' Academy fills this vast cavern with the sounds of combat
training. Drow fighters practice deadly techniques under the watchful
eyes of weapon masters, their movements fluid and precise in the dim
faerie fire light. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the
corners.

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5119.name: The Entrance To The Temple Of Lloth
5119.description:
The temple is the largest building in the city. Even its doors are
beyond imagination. Inside of the temple entrance, the walls are made of
gold and adamantite. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and
musty.

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

down.description: A passage leads to The Entrance Hall

5120.name: The Mages' Academy
5120.description:
The Mages' Academy is fairly well decorated and Visible is that the drow
prefer magic over physical power greatly. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5121.name: A City Street
5121.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street going eastward. To the north
is a building. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and
musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Mages' Academy

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5122.name: The Slave Chamber
5122.description:
The room is in shambles. Straw is strewn all about the room as beds for
the unfortunate creatures who have fallen prey to drow imperialism. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

east.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5123.name: A City Street
5123.description:
You walk along a highly ornate city street leading west and south. To
the north is a relatively small house. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The 4th House

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

west.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5124.name: The 4th House
5124.description:
The area opens inside the 4th house of the city. Its inner courtyard is
rather dull by drow standards and rather small as well. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

east.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

south.description: A passage leads to A City Street

5125.name: The Throne Room
5125.description:
The throne room is basically similar to the inner courtyard in regards
to decor. there is a small throne behind the altar but that is about it.
Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

west.description: A passage leads to The 4th House

5126.name: The Entrance Hall
5126.description:
The area opens in the entrance way to the temple which opens up to the
north into a large hallway going east and west. Small statues os spiders
line the entrance way's walls. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hallway

up.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Temple Of Lloth

5127.name: A Hallway
5127.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. To the north is a obsidian stairway. Shadows gather in
the corners. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Grand Stairway

south.description: A passage leads to The Entrance Hall

east.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5128.name: A Long Hallway
5128.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch.

east.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to A Hallway

5129.name: A Long Hallway
5129.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. To the north is a door. Shadows gather in the corners.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to The Weaponsmaster's Chamber

east.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5130.name: A Long Hallway
5130.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still and
musty.

east.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5131.name: A Long Hallway
5131.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

east.description: A passage leads to A Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5132.name: A Long Hallway
5132.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. To the south is a door. Shadows gather in the corners.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

south.description: A passage leads to The Warriors' Barracks

west.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5133.name: The Warriors' Barracks
5133.description:
The room is a complete mess. None of the beds are made, clothes and
other items have been left all about the room. Well drow warriors never
were known for neatness. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5134.name: A Long Hallway
5134.description:
This is a long hallway lined with adamantite. The walls are engraved
with pictures of elves and spiders. The hallway continues east and west.
As you look down the hallway you can make out one or two figures moving
away from you. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air
is still and musty.

east.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5135.name: The Grand Stairway
5135.description:
The area opens at the bottom of a giant obsidian and adamantite
stairway. The edges are trimmed with gold. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The air is still and musty.

south.description: A passage leads to A Hallway

up.description: A passage leads to The Grand Hallway

5136.name: The Grand Hallway
5136.description:
This is the middle of a grand hallway. The walls are of the purest
adamantite with gold trim. Mosaics line the walls. Shadows gather in the
corners. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Grand Hallway

east.description: A passage leads to The Mages' Barracks

down.description: A passage leads to The Grand Stairway

5137.name: The Mages' Barracks
5137.description:
The mage's living quarters is rather clean with the exception of a few
used component containers. It is rather well decorated as well. Cots
line the floor for the mages to sleep on. The only door is to the west.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

west.description: A passage leads to The Grand Hallway

5138.name: The Grand Hallway
5138.description:
The way continues down a grand hallway, heavily decorated with
adamantite and gold. To the north the hall goes down a flight of stairs
while a door is to the west. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

south.description: A passage leads to The Grand Hallway

west.description: A passage leads to The Clerics' Barracks

down.description: A passage leads to The Grand Stairway

5139.name: The Clerics' Barracks
5139.description:
The bed chamber is brightly decorated with spider shaped statues, murals
and the like. Large beds line the floor making this a comfortable room
to live in. The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

east.description: A passage leads to The Grand Hallway

5140.name: The Grand Stairway
5140.description:
The area is climbing a set of obsidian stairs surrounded by adamantite
walls. To the north are a set of large golden doors. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A passage leads to The Main Chamber

up.description: A passage leads to The Grand Hallway

5141.name: The Main Chamber
5141.description:
This is the south side of a large auditorium used for services by the
drow priestesses. In the center is a large sacrificial pit and beyond
that is an altar. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust
motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: A passage leads to The Eastern Side Of The Main Chamber

south.description: A passage leads to The Grand Stairway

west.description: A passage leads to The Western Side Of The Main Chamber

5142.name: The Eastern Side Of The Main Chamber
5142.description:
The area is the eastern side of the chamber overlooking the pit. To the
east is a door while to the north is an altar. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to The Altar

east.description: A passage leads to The Slave Cells

south.description: A passage leads to The Main Chamber

5143.name: The Sacrificial Pit
5143.description:
As you climb down into the pit, thousands of spiders cover you, tearing
your fragile body to shreds. Lloth thanks you for your sacrifice.
Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and musty.

5144.name: The Western Side Of The Main Chamber
5144.description:
The area is the western side of the main chamber overlooking a
sacrificial pit. To the north is an altar. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to The Altar

south.description: A passage leads to The Main Chamber

5145.name: The Altar
5145.description:
This is front of a highly and freshly bloodstained altar. Engraved on
the top of the altar is a giant spider with a human head. Looking down
from the altar you see a large sacrificial pit with thousands of
swarming spiders looking for their next meal! The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to The Dias

east.description: A passage leads to The Eastern Side Of The Main Chamber

west.description: A passage leads to The Western Side Of The Main Chamber

down.description: A dark pit gapes below the altar.

5146.name: The Slave Cells
5146.description:
This is the main room to the cell chambers for the slaves to be
sacrificed. You notice there are no guards around. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Slave Pen

west.description: A passage leads to The Eastern Side Of The Main Chamber

5147.name: The Slave Pen
5147.description:
Rotten meat and breads lie about the floor while shackles hang from the
walls. The room reeks of death. You almost become nauseous and decide to
leave the room since you were obviously too late to save the slave. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to The Slave Cells

5148.name: The Dias
5148.description:
The area opens upon a dias behind the altar. above is a enormous
illusion of a female drow turning into a giant spider and back again.
There is a door to the west. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

south.description: A passage leads to The Altar

west.description: A passage leads to The Treasury

5149.name: The Treasury
5149.description:
This is obviously only a temporary storage place for the collected
treasure being rather bare. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows
gather in the corners.

east.description: A passage leads to The Dias

5150.name: The Weaponsmaster's Chamber
5150.description:
This one-person bedchamber is very elegant. The owner must be held in
high regard to get this kind of treatment. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

south.description: A passage leads to A Long Hallway

5100.name: goblin
5100.long_desc: A goblin slave lies here asleep.
5100.description: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.

5101.name: drow
5101.long_desc: A drow commoner is here, walking around on guard duty.
5101.description: I doubt he is the type to give directions.

5102.name: drow
5102.long_desc: A drow warrior stands here guarding his home.

5103.name: drow
5103.long_desc: A drow mage is here protecting his home.
5103.description: The mage prepares to cast a spell... at you!!

5104.name: drow
5104.long_desc: A drow priestess is here shouting orders.
5104.description: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

5105.name: drow
5105.long_desc: A drow master stares at you angrily.
5105.description: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

5106.name: drow
5106.long_desc: A drow weaponsmaster is here shadow boxing.
5106.description: He definitely know his way around in combat.

5107.name: drow
5107.long_desc: The Matron Mother of the house is standing here.
5107.description: She looks really and truly annoyed that you have found your way here.

5108.name: drow
5108.long_desc: The Matron Mother of the first house is waiting for you.
5108.description: She looks like she is about to rip your head of and eat it.

5109.name: drider
5109.long_desc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
5109.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

5110.name: drider
5110.long_desc: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
5110.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

5111.name: yochlol
5111.long_desc: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist...
5111.description: The yochlol is not in a good mood.

5100.name: longsword
5100.room_desc: A commoner's longsword made of adamantite has been left here.

5101.name: longsword
5101.room_desc: A drow noble's longsword, made of adamantite, lies here.

5102.name: whip
5102.room_desc: A whip with two snakes heads lies here.

5103.name: whip
5103.room_desc: A whip with three snake heads has been left here.

5104.name: whip
5104.room_desc: A whip with four snake heads has been carelessly left here.

5105.name: longsword
5105.room_desc: A black longsword has been carelessly left here.

5106.name: whip
5106.room_desc: A whip with 5 snake heads has been carelessly dropped here.

5107.name: whip
5107.room_desc: A whip with six snake heads has been dropped here very carelessly.

5108.name: bracers
5108.room_desc: A pair of iron bracers has been dropped here.

5109.name: gauntlets
5109.room_desc: A pair of gauntlets is lying on the ground.

5110.name: wand
5110.room_desc: A silvery blue wand has been dropped in the dirt.

5111.name: helmet
5111.room_desc: A small helmet lies up against a rock.

5112.name: ring
5112.room_desc: A small ruby ring lies in the dirt.

5113.name: dagger
5113.room_desc: A dagger with spider leg shaped blades lies on the ground.

5114.name: hat
5114.room_desc: A small bright green hat lies in the dirt.

5115.name: key
5115.room_desc: A key made of a strange metal is lying here.

5116.name: gold
5116.room_desc: A large pile of golden coins is lying here.

5120.name: shadow priory reliquary
5120.room_desc: A shadow priory reliquary lies here.

5151.name: drow shadow armor
5151.room_desc: Dark armor radiating shadow lies here.
5151.description: Armor woven from drow silk and shadow.

5152.name: drow shadow cloak
5152.room_desc: A cloak of living shadow lies here.

5153.name: drow shadow blade
5153.room_desc: A black blade pulses with shadow.

5154.name: drow shadow ring
5154.room_desc: A ring of darkness lies here.
